00012 #include <QtDeclarative>
00013 #include "stkmainwindow.h"
00014 #include "stkmenumodel.h"
00015 #include "stkdefines.h"
00016 
00017 StkMainWindow::StkMainWindow(StkIf *stkIf, QWidget *parent) :
00018     QMainWindow(parent)
00019 {
00020     mStkIf = stkIf;
00021     // Store SimToolkit interface properties
00022     mStkProperties = new StkOfonoProperties(mStkIf);
00023     // Create a main menu as central widget
00024     this->mView = new QDeclarativeView;
00025     this->mView->setSource(QUrl("qrc:/stkmenu.qml"));
00026     this->mView->setResizeMode(QDeclarativeView::SizeRootObjectToView);
00027     this->setCentralWidget(this->mView);
00028     QObject *root = this->mView->rootObject();
00029     QObject *icon = root->findChild<QObject*>("icon");
00030     if (icon)
00031         icon->setProperty("source", mStkProperties->mainMenuIconUrl());
00032     QObject *title = root->findChild<QObject*>("title");
00033     if (title)
00034         title->setProperty("text", mStkProperties->mainMenuTitle());
00035     QDeclarativeContext *context = mView->rootContext();
00036     StkMenuModel * menuModel = new StkMenuModel();
00037     menuModel->setMenuItems(mStkProperties->mainMenuItems());
00038     context->setContextProperty("menuModel",menuModel);
00039     // connect signals
00040     connect(root, SIGNAL(itemSelected(int)), this, SLOT(responseOkWithSelection(int)));
00041     connect(root, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SLOT(close()));
00042     connect(root, SIGNAL(endSession()), this, SLOT(close()));
00043 }
00044 
00045 StkMainWindow::~StkMainWindow()
00046 {
00047     delete this->mView;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void StkMainWindow::responseOkWithSelection(int selection)
00051 {
00052     uchar sel = (uchar)selection;
00053     QDBusObjectPath stkAgentPath(STK_AGENT_PATH);
00054     mStkIf->SelectItem(sel,stkAgentPath);
00055 }
